Tamarix chinensis
( Tamaricaceae ).

General distribution: Spain , France , Germany , Switzerland , Austria , Italy , Czech Republic , Hungary , Russia , Kazakhstan , Mongolia , South Korea , Japan , China (Beijing, Hebei, Jiangxi, Inner Mongolia , Qinghai, Heilongjiang, Sichuan, Yunnan, Xizang).
